sponsor: Teva Branded Pharmaceutical Products R&D, Inc.
briefTitle: Study of an Investigational Nasal Aerosol or Placebo in Children (Ages 4 to 11) With Perennial Allergic Rhinitis (PAR)
officialTitle: A Randomized, Double-Blind, Placebo-Controlled, Parallel-Group, 12-Week, Clinical Study Designed to Assess the Efficacy and Safety of BDP Nasal Aerosol (80 mcg, Once Daily) in Pediatric Subjects (4 to 11 Years of Age) With PAR
summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the efficacy and safety of Beclomethasone dipropionate (BDP) nasal aerosol in subjects with Perennial Allergic Rhinitis (PAR).

primaryOutcome.measure: Change From Baseline in the Average Morning (AM) and Evening (PM) Subject-Reported Reflective Total Nasal Symptom Score (rTNSS) Over The First 6 Weeks Of Treatment In Subjects 6 To 11 Years Of Age
primaryOutcome.timeFrame: Baseline (Day -4 to Day 1 predose), Day 1 (postdose) to Week 6
